# The Thirsty Filly

0

(0 reviews)

  * Bartender
  * Travels up to 60 miles

Media Overview Reviews Booking Info

Add to Favorites

Get a Free Quick Quote

## Overview

Based in Beautiful Ashtabula, we are Northeast Ohio's premier mobile
bartending service. Our awarding winning mobile bar service prioritizes
elegant aesthetics as well as hand crafted cocktails for each of our clients
at their memorable event. As 2022 brings new events, weddings, birthdays, and
celebrations, we are prepared to walk alongside you at your next memorable
moment.

-Award Winning-  
Ohio Wedding Collective Mobile Bar Of Ohio (2020)  
The Knot Best Of Weddings (2022)

* * *

##  Reviews

Be the first to review The Thirsty Filly

Write a Review

* * *

## Booking Info

  * Profile
  * Setup Requirements

Price Range: $1500 and up

Languages: English

Insurance: $1,000,000 - GL /LL / policy

### What to Expect

Based in Beautiful Ashtabula, we are Northeast Ohio's premier mobile
bartending service. While we were raised close to the city of Cleveland and
have remained residents of Ashtabula county, our passion for the country and
city life have merged to create a perfect match. A lot of thought and
creativity combined allowed us to realize one definite certainty- the
similarity between the city and country lifestyle, is the shared love of a
great tasting cocktail! To house our rustic cocktail creations, along our
journey, we purchased vintage horse trailers/ trucks and converted them into
your hottest bartending hotspot. Our goal was to emphasize the charm of wooden
surfaces with flair of rustic decor. After we labored with love, we are
excited to introduce " The Thirsty Filly". As 2021 brings new events,
weddings, birthdays, and celebrations, we are prepared to walk alongside you
at your next memorable moment.

-Award Winning-  
Ohio Wedding Collective Mobile Bar Of Ohio (2020)  
The Knot Best Of Weddings (2022)

\+ Read More

### Additional Booking Notes

We require level ground for parking our mobile bars as well as electricity.

### Setup Requirements

Outlet for power

Level Ground

Report this Profile

Compare rates and availability of local entertainers and vendors.

### Book something awesome.®

## Joining GigSalad is quick and easy.

Lightning

#### For Gigging Professionals

##### Are you a performer, speaker, or event services provider?

GigSalad provides a full-service platform for booking gigs. Get leads, send
quotes, and collect payments all in one place. Get your gig on®!

Clipboard

#### For Event Planners

##### Are you planning an event and want to hire talent or services?

GigSalad connects you with local vendors and provides a safe and easy platform
for booking with a Worry-Free Guarantee.
